scripts.build: npm run build -w @tspark/common; npm run build -w @tspark/api; npm run build -w @tspark/client
scripts.start:dev: concurrently -n "common-watch,api-watch,api,client" "npm run watch -w=@tspark/common -- --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run watch -w=@tspark/api -- --preserveWatchOutput" "npm run start:dev -w=@tspark/api" "npm run start:dev -w=@tspark/client"
